title: Ninja Gaiden 2 Wallpaper Font
content:
Hello everyone

Is there a font like this? or an similar font?

[http://img5.imagebanana.com/view/8najumeu/ninjagaidenii32.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140919031826/http:/img5.imagebanana.com/view/8najumeu/ninjagaidenii32.jpg)

thanks x3
author: Skazi

comments.content:
To me it looks like a highly customized version of [ITC Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140919031826/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-benguiat/).

- Mike Yanega
Mind that the N's are slightly different. This is rather 'inspired by' than customized ;-)
